verses.text: Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* came \add to me\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; I was \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, and I was \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for her with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; I am \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*; and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; There shall yet old \w men|strong="H2205"\w* and old \w women|strong="H2205"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* for \w very|strong="H7230"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft very…: Heb. multitude of days\f*

And the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w boys|strong="H3206"\w* and \w girls|strong="H3207"\w* \w playing|strong="H7832"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* thereof.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; If it be \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in these \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, should it also be \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* in mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.  +  r 8.6  t marvellous: or, hard, or, difficult *

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Behold, I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, and from the \w west|strong="H3996"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*;\f + \fr 8.7 \ft the west…: Heb. the country of the going down of the sun\f*

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them, and they shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Let your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, ye that \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* in these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, which \add were\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* was \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*, that the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* might be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*.

For \w before|strong="H6440"\w* these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* there \w was|strong="H1961"\w* no \w hire|strong="H7939"\w* for \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, nor any \w hire|strong="H7939"\w* for \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; neither \add was there any\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to him that went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* or came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* because of the \w affliction|strong="H6862"\w*: for I \w set|strong="H7971"\w* all \w men|strong="H0120"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft there was…: or, the hire of man became nothing\f*

But now I \add will\add* not \add be\add* unto the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as in the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

For the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add shall be\add* \w prosperous|strong="H7965"\w*; the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, and the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her \w increase|strong="H2981"\w*, and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* their \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*; and I will cause the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* all these \add things\add*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft prosperous: Heb. of peace\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* as ye were a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; so will I \w save|strong="H3467"\w* you, and ye shall be a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, \add but\add* let your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; As I \w thought|strong="H2161"\w* to \w punish|strong="H7489"\w* you, when your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* provoked me to \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and I \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* not:

So \w again|strong="H7725"\w* have I \w thought|strong="H2161"\w* in these \w days|strong="H3117"\w* to do \w well|strong="H3190"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye not.

¶ These \add are\add* the \w things|strong="H1697"\w* that ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* ye every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*; \w execute|strong="H8199"\w* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* in your \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:\f + \fr 8.16 \ft execute…: Heb. judge truth, and the judgment of peace\f*

And let \w none|strong="H0376"\w* of you \w imagine|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*; and \w love|strong="H0157"\w* no \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*: for all these \add are things\add* that I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; The \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* of the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add month\add*, and the \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* of the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*, and the \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*, and the \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* of the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w*, shall be to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, and \w cheerful|strong="H2896"\w* \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*; therefore \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 8.19 \ft feasts: or, solemn, or, set times\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \add It shall\add* yet \add come to pass\add*, that there shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*:

And the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add city\add* shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w another|strong="H0259"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w speedily|strong="H1980"\w* to \w pray|strong="H2470"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* also.  +  r 8.21  t speedily: or, continually: Heb. going *  +  r 8.21  t to pray…: Heb. to intreat the face of *

Yea, \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and to \w pray|strong="H2470"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 8.22  t to pray…: Heb. to intreat the face of *

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add it shall come to pass\add*, that \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* out of all \w languages|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, even shall take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of him that is a \w Jew|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with you: for we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add that\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* with you.
